title: [Savor Your Magic, Parchment]
description: Pale ivory chiffon is draped from corner to corner of each wall and affixed to the wall with tiny brass flowers.  A large carpet in dual tones of midnight blue and azure stretches across the oak flooring and an ornamental case stands in it's center.  Several ivory display cases dot one wall, while a sleek silvery silk settee takes up another.

Pale ivory chiffon is draped from corner to corner of each wall and affixed to the wall with tiny brass flowers.  A large carpet in dual tones of midnight blue and azure stretches across the oak flooring and a slender silver case stands in it's center.  Several ivory display cases dot one wall, while a sleek silvery silk settee takes up another.
